help-file.title: "CREATE GREATER DRACOLICH"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <corpse> Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Animation lasts until undead follower dies (again) Type of spell: Summoning
If the Necromancer has a suitable corpse at his feet, "Create Dracolich" will transform the corpse into a powerful winged dragon more powerful than its counterpart, "Create Dracolich".
